userId.description: ID of the patron the item was lent to

userBarcode.description: Barcode of the patron the item was lent to

loanId.description: Unique ID (generated UUID) of the loan

dateOfLoss.description: A date when the item was lost

title.description: The primary title (or label) associated with the resource

identifiers.description: An extensible set of name-value pairs of identifiers associated with the resource

identifierTypeId.description: UUID of resource identifier type (e.g. ISBN, ISSN, LCCN, CODEN, Locally defined identifiers)

itemBarcode.description: Text, with input likely validated by the barcode scanner

loanType.description: Permanent loan type, is the default loan type for a given item.

effectiveCallNumberComponents.description: Elements of a full call number generated from the item or holding

callNumber.description: Effective Call Number is an identifier assigned to an item or its holding and associated with the item.

prefix.description: Effective Call Number Prefix is the prefix of the identifier assigned to an item or its holding and associated with the item.

suffix.description: Effective Call Number Suffix is the suffix of the identifier assigned to an item or its holding and associated with the item.

permanentItemLocation.description: Permanent item location is the default location, shelving location, or holding which is a physical place where items are stored, or an Online location.

feeFineType.description: Description of fee/fine that is up to the discretion of the user

metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes, provided by the server (client should not provide)
